snippet: The cabinet of Chancellor Angela Merkel approved legislation that would grant oversight of such institutions to the European Central Bank.
abstract: Europe inches closer to establishing European banking union for Continent's largest lenders after Germany's cabinet approves legislation that would grant to the European Central Bank oversight of such institutions.
lead_paragraph: The cabinet of Chancellor Angela Merkel approved legislation that would grant oversight of such institutions to the European Central Bank.

headline.main: Europe Inches Closer to Establishing a Banking Union
headline.print_headline: In Germany, Small Step Toward European Banking Union
